Package org.project.Controller.States

Class VerifyGrillableState

java.lang.Object
org.project.Controller.States.VerifyGrillableState
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameState
public class VerifyGrillableState extends Object implements GameState
VerifyGrillableState is responsible for checking if the current player's grid has enough space to place the picked tiles. If there is enough space, the state transitions to VerifyBoardableState. If there is not enough space, an InvalidMoveException is thrown and the state remains in VerifyGrillableState.

      public void changeState() throws InvalidMoveException
